Title: Vaillant ecoTEC Plus 418 heat only boiler pack with flue
Description: Supplied with a choice of flue to suit your installation, the Vaillant ecoTEC plus 418 high efficiency heat only boiler is an ideal solution in homes where low water pressure problems mean that an open vent system with hot water storage is the only choice. ErP A-rated, the ecoTec plus offers compatibility with both solar panels and smart controls, helping to create a more eco-friendly heating system.

Title: Vaillant Ecotec Plus 2 826 boiler only pack
Description: Connecting to a wide variety of controls, the updated Vaillant ecoTEC Plus 826 combi boiler can be operated via app meaning you never have to worry about coming home to a chilly house. Easy to install, maintain and service, this 26kW boiler has a smart internal layout with all vital components in easy reach. And because the ecoTEC's footprint and connections haven't changed, retrofitting in the same position as an old, worn boiler is simple. Offering ease of operation and inBUS technology, the ecoTEC Plus gives the homeowner ErP A-rated efficiency and the option to switch to LPG or, at a later date, hydrogen.
